Text: Friends (Justin Bieber and BloodPop song):  The song was released through GENPOP Corporation, RBMG Records, School Boy Records, Def Jam Recordings and Republic Records on August 17, 2017.

Text: Friends (Justin Bieber and BloodPop song):  It is Bieber's first single credited as lead artist to be released in over a year, the previous being "Company", which was released in March 2016 for his studio album "Purpose" (2015).
